title: Ultra Luxury 4 Bedroom Mediterranean Sea View Villas in Chaweng
description:
Key Features
- 4 bedroom with en-suite bathroom 
- 2 storey mediterranean style design 
- Fully furnished villas
- Stylish wooden features
- Open-plan living and dining area 
- infinity-edge swimming pool 
- Balinese stone titles
- Equipped Western style kitchen
- High quality fitting & appliances 
- Soaking tub and rain-showers
- Land sizes: 1200 sqm
- Built size: 460 sqm
- Freehold tenure
- Chanote title

Location details:

- 5 minutes drive to beaches, shops & amenities
- 5 minutes to supermarkets, schools & hospitals
- 10 minutes drive to International Airport




Location details:
